website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive tool with excellent specs and high customer satisfaction rates.
pros: Self-leveling with a helpful red LED light indicator
cons: Range is decent but not extraordinary

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and get a tripod
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised; plumb and level. Rugged enough. Batteries seem to last quite a while. Good price. You'll have occasional issues mounting it (usually to get right height); the clip wants objects like ladder sides and frame lumber, not so much finished door jambs or thick furniture. Do yourself a favor and get a standard camera tripod, 60" or more if you can find one. The unit mounts to it just like a camera would.
customer_reviews.author: cassembler

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping. I needed this for a swimming pool ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. I needed this for a swimming pool I was installing. With 1/2 inch from level over an oval shaped area 38 feet by 18 feet this little dandy was a life saver. I only wish it were brighter. Can't see it in bright sunlight. We just did our grade checking at night. It works well for indoors, anytime. Hanging shelves pictures etc. Is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: G.T

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after watching a video on installing a curtain rod and they used a laser level. It looked like a cool thing to have and this one had good reviews. I am so glad I bought this. It was easy to use and really so much easier than my very old spirit level. I used it to install my curtain rod and used the vertical option to install the pulley in line with the edge of the curtain rod. I anticipate finding lots of uses for this in the future. A very worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre, even when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: This laser level was so dim that I had to turn off my lights and close my blinds to see it at any distance beyond a few feet. I made it work for one project, then put it away without batteries inside. I pulled it out to use about 6 mo later and put fresh batteries in it. The horizontal line no longer works at all. It's not a mode issue or anything that their troubleshooting helped with. The horizontal laser is simply broken. The extended warranty was such a hassle I gave up even trying and just trashed the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Roughton

customer_reviews.title: It has to be completely dark
customer_reviews.text: The laser is too weak for daylight, needed this for outside deck building, works great in complete darkness but if there's too much light it cant be seen more than a few feet away. Other than that its built well and operates as described
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good results.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good results with this so far. I like the fact you can either use the clamp that is included or screw it onto a camera tripod (not included). For my purposes, the tripod option worked better (squaring up a shower rough in). Easy to use and like the fact it will self level if you are within the 4 degree tolerance specs. The laser line can wash out if you have too much light in the room. I often work with a very bright LED work light in rooms I am remodeling and I ended up turning off the LED work light when using this laser. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the competitive price scare you. This device is every bit as accurate as its nearest competitors at around two-thirds the price. I am very impressed with this little unit's accuracy, ease of use, durability, and battery life. The red/green level indicator light is great. If the light​ is green, the beam is level. If the light is read, you simply "eyeball" the unit until you get a green light. Really fast and really easy to use. My only complaint is one that I think is common to all laser devices: The beam widens out, and is over 1/8" wide at 30'.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. McKee

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it's worth
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this laser level--I hadn't realized that a tripod of some sort is almost necessary to use this. The level has to be at the height that is needed for your project. The laser light is also very, very faint unless you are close to the wall. So, finding something nearby to clip it to while it's at the correct height made this more trouble than it was worth. I found a cheap laser level at Lowe's that is much more user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Foster

customer_reviews.title: You too can make everything level
customer_reviews.text: I don't even remember what I bought this for, but I use it all the time now. I have levelled pictures, TVs, car seats, and more. Mine seems to be very accurate because it lines up perfectly with the wall edges in my house. If you are the type of person that will be annoyed by knowing that something that you hung isn't perfectly level, then you should buy this product. The only caveat is that you probably want a compatible tripod too. I still haven't bought one but it is very tedious to adjust the height of the level line by stacking up objects of varying thickness!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan & Kat

customer_reviews.title: Communication with this company was horrible. I simply asked what size adapter I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Communication with this company was horrible. I simply asked what size adapter I needed to fit my tripod and they responded that they don’t sell them!!! This unit is misleading as well because it doesn’t rotate a line 360. You have to turn it manually!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Pramik

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good, Yet Inexpensive Level
customer_reviews.text: Quite inexpensive compared to "pro" models, and I suppose they outperform it on some level (no pun intended), but I'm using it right now to level and install new kitchen cabinets, and it's more than adequate. I'm very happy with it. Next comes a row of picture frames and I'm sure I will be very satisfied with the dead-level results it will give me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L Heal

customer_reviews.title: Best value, works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: for the price this piece is fantastic. a few drawbacks, the clamp is a bit touchy, the laser can be dimmed if the environment lighting is to bright, and aligning the laser takes a bit more time than I had hoped. First use was aligning hooks in a ceiling over a 30' span made 2 marks and needed help to align them but sped up the process and was more consistent then measuring for each piece.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: No home should be without one, nifty.
customer_reviews.text: This product works like a champ. We worked in natural daylight and the lasers (red) were very bright and easily visible. The room had the overhead light on, one window and one french door with the plantation shutters open. It made a normally painstaking, tedious job quick and easy. Nice! Love the clamp, opens big enough to put practically anywhere. My husband clamped it to the door.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not buy this earlier?
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one years ago. After tracing lines with a regular level for a number of home improvement projects, I finally bought this and no regrets. It's super easy to use and make things such as installing cabinets, large mirrors, etc. a breeze. I found it particularly helpful with projects including several walls. The laser line going across makes it very easy. I wish I had it when redoing my kitchen. It is very accurate. I checked mine vs. a much more expensive one from a contractor and it was comparing very well.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for most any vertical or horizontal leveling needs
customer_reviews.text: I use this device in a variety of settings from hanging pictures to building houses. Very rugged, comes with a multi clip mount that you can jury rig in a myriad of ways. Used it to mount white boards in 25 class rooms. Premarked center lines on the walls and mounted the level on a rolling cart - finished the 25 rooms almost as fast as we could move from room to room. If you need a quick reference or a dead level line this is a great tool. Get a hard case to keep it in.
customer_reviews.author: colonelwa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Easy leveling and mounts onto tripod.
customer_reviews.text: This level is great. It is simple to use and mounts to my camera tripod. I am painting a stripe on the wall of my new garage. I am painting this in 3 stages and every time I set this guy up on the tripod, all I have to do it match the line up to the already panted section and it does the rest. The stripe is perfectly straight and level across the whole garage and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Wished I had these earlier
customer_reviews.text: Even in lighted environment, these laser alignments were easy to see. So easy to use with no additional setup required. Had another level laser some time back but this one is really easy to use and I just love the ease in getting things put up on account of this wonderful device. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Francis S Heng

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and the included bracket is great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for install level and even lights. Can’t say enough good things about the great mounting bracket that comes with it because it is indispensable and fantastic. This laser level is step above you average inexpensive laser level. I know because I had previously bought one that was so bad I had to return it. But this is great! I’m so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: 04rk88

customer_reviews.title: Useful for Tile Setting, very strong and bright.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Tile Setting. The problem with some laser lines is they are too dim if you get too far away but this one is really strong. I didn't measure at what point it starts to get dim since I have only used it a few times but I set it for about 25 feet on the one job and it was still clear and bright. I love this thing. It pays to spend a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: J. smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, especially for such a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome laser level with everything a noob like me could need to be able to hang wallpaper straight, tile on the straight and narrow, or hang doors in the manner to which they are accustomed. Unit has a good weight in the hand, and seems to include the same features as many other units of a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: CompassTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works for indoor projects
customer_reviews.text: You cannot see the projected lines outdoors, even on a dull day. Works for indoor projects if it's not too bright where you are working. What I needed it for was to stand four posts vertical, and to be honest it does that, as long as you are willing to work in the pitch dark after midnight.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon B. West

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: But the swivel thingy on the bottom doesn't tighten properly eve after only limited use, overall like it though way better than my rubbish Bosch I bought that stopped working after a few times it fell on the first job. Even bought another few for my contractor nephews.
customer_reviews.author: Avrohom

customer_reviews.title: Saved me hours of measuring!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time to hang 6 frames all in a row. Worked as described after I looked at the instructions. Placed it on a tripod I use for photography and it made my job so much easier - all the frames are perfectly aligned! This would have taken me hours of measuring and double checking if I hung them manually, not to mention giving me a huge headache.
customer_reviews.author: CMC_UT

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Wanted one of these for a while but put off due to the expense of retail, big box name-brand equivalents. We are putting in a patio and I couldn't live without this guy, no string lines and bubble levels, just instant gratification. We have other projects in mind (trim, decorative molding) and I'm certain additional uses will emerge.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works great at night.
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once so far to mark a line along the inside walls of a backyard ice rink. I put it in the high corner and I could still see the line on the otherside of the rink which was 70ft away. I did it in the dark though. Im pretty sure you wouldn't be able to see it that far in daytime. I haven't actually tried it in the day yet. Once I filled it with water I could tell this did a great job with a nice level line. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schmidtke

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now. .......
customer_reviews.text: Packaged so well I store it in the original box. READ the directions and you won't be disappointed. Lazer is, of course, weak in sunlight, but consider the price and set it up in the shade. I appreciate quality and I think it's a "keeper."
customer_reviews.author: Don T

customer_reviews.title: Get a pole with this laser
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good laser level. However, a word of warning: you're almost always going to need a pole when using this. A tripod will not do it, because raising and lowering the tripod is too cumbersome, and you can't but get so high. A pole is a must.
customer_reviews.author: K. O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Does work well with day light
customer_reviews.text: Order this. At first while testing it in the house in the evening it worked great! You can see how it levels and the vertical and horizontal lines. Then I brought it over to my work site and I could only see the first 2 feet of the laser and nothing after that. It was daylight with a lot of sun coming in from the windows and couldn’t see a thing. Definitely disappointed in it since at first I love the value and how it worked in a dark room. Unfortunately I would use it during the day so it wouldn’t be any good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this laser for home construction projects, automotive projects around the house, hanging pictures, leveling tables. Im amazed at the myriad ways I use this tool. Great value for the price. Im very pleased. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tom Holt

customer_reviews.title: It helps when you can get a nice level line and not have to worry about a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this auto leveler because I got tired of adjusting things that look about right when measuring. It helps when you can get a nice level line and not have to worry about a slight dip in the floor or ceiling causing your measurements to be slightly off then hanging items. I ended up building 10'x8'x2' shelves in my garage and this lined each shelve up perfectly. Worth it for any tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews on this product, I wasn't sure if it would do what I wanted. Now, after using the product I absolutely love it. Is it a super bright laser, no. BUT for the price, it works great for me. I LOVE the mounting mechanism. It can be mounted virtually anywhere. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One of the best laser tool I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Man! That is a really helpful tool! I immediately started using it with my camera stand. A task to hand the pictures next to each other or two pictures one above the other became super easy. It was always a pain in the neck before. Now it is very, very simple. I wish I had taller camera stand but using a chair also works.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So Handy! Well worth the money if you need to hang things!
customer_reviews.text: We put up pictures and mirrors this weekend and this thing was sooo super handy! Works great! It has a self-leveling setting as well as a fixed setting, if you want the laser lines to be at a certain angle.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: I use this a lot. Simple to get clamped ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot. Simple to get clamped and pointed to set a level line and does a decent job. I've used it in a 36' garage and no problems with the line at that distance. Worked with it a little outside but the sun can be a hindrance. Setup simple, does the job, clamps onto a tripod, 2x4 or most places I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mushka

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!!  What a nice Surprise!!!
customer_reviews.text: To me, Simply Amazing!! What a nice Surprise!!! Much better than expected. Works great. Very accurate, & I know how to test it!! I am using it for lots of things. Have already measured the foundation of the house & garage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it can't be tilted too much for auto level to work. Thus, level has to be mounted high for high areas for auto leveling; reason for 4-stars. However, there is a setting to use as a normal laser level. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jrf

customer_reviews.title: Great level
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few weeks, but am in the middle of a major renovation project and have used it a ton. It has been a god-send. It is very accurate and so incredibly easy to use. This level and a tape measure allows you to level ANYTHING. Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DaveD

customer_reviews.title: line not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to mark lines for crown. Could not get a straight line. Probably ok for baseboards or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lisia Ann Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Useful device
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of years, and it has come in handy many times: for applying tile to a kitchen wall, aligning / squaring counters and cabinets, setting posts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Irv Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Durable, basic 3-way laser level.
customer_reviews.text: Three laser modes for a horizontal line, vertical and both at once. My brother and I have red/green color blindness, so the only time we can see the laser is after sunset. But our sighted friends can see it easily. The clamp that comes with it functions well and stays anchored.
customer_reviews.author: dj-1984

customer_reviews.title: On the level
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little laser level. It's got just the right amount of features and it's inexpensive. I replaced an old broken laser unit that originally cost 10 times as much, and this one is far better. Easy to use, very bright laser. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy King

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This tool has a few options I was not expecting. You can turn on each laser line individually as well as switch between auto leveling or a manual "fixed" mode. It may not be the best construction quality but for the price I am very happy with this level.
customer_reviews.author: Major Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Great level laser!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. I mount it onto a $7.00 cargo bar I bought at the discount tool supply. I used it for hanging shelving and drywall and it works great. The self leveling feature saves a lot of time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great help
customer_reviews.text: I got it a couple of weeks ago. I checked it for precision and consistency, it seems essentially perfect to me. I wish I bought it a long time ago, really any measurement job in the house is easier with this and at least one stupid mistake would have been avoided. The pendulum locks in place when you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jindrich Zapletal

customer_reviews.title: Good Auto Leveler
customer_reviews.text: First one I got the vertices beam was not that straight. Sent for a replacement and the second one is spot on. The clamps makes this leveling tool very easy to use and can clamp on most surface
customer_reviews.author: Thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use. I had a need to hang two side by side panels that were slighly off by 3/8 of an inch on hight and this level made the job easy! The Clamp that comes with this product is what makes it work. It will clamp to just about anything so on my project I needed a hight well above a standard camera tridod so I used a 8' ladder. I had been putting this project off for over a year and successfully completed it in less than 30 minutes. By the way if you are a perfectionist you diffinitely need this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best tool purchase in a long long time
customer_reviews.text: Best tool purchase in a long long time. I remember the days of living without this, and those were truly dark ages.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Antonyan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the money. I used it 3 times already working on a new house. It helped me with tiling the bathroom; making a straight line painting and putting up shelves in the closet. This is definitely easy to use and very accurate. Stop playing around using a level and get yourself one of these...you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: No replacement clamps available from company.
customer_reviews.text: Laser level works fine, but don't break the clamp that comes with it! Company will not sell a replacement clamp for this unit, you'll need to find something else that works.
customer_reviews.author: Gyro Gearloose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at this price!
customer_reviews.text: This level is fantastic for its price! It levels easily, clamps to a ladder, chair, milkjug.. whatever works. We were very pleased and have used it to help tile, hang mirrors, anything that you want level or plumb or both.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: and this made it sooooo easy!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one of these, but could not justify the expense over using just a bubble level. But we moved and I had a lot of shelves to hang, and this made it sooooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great level. Dead accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great level. Dead accurate. I used it at night to level a 14x34 foot garage pad. Projected 10 feet out from the pad and this still had plenty of power to illuminate all the way to the end of the pad (40+ feet). Very pleased. Also, IT HAS A LOCK. Someone mentioned it did not, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: WET

customer_reviews.title: This bad buy is a must have for hanging floating shelves
customer_reviews.text: I base my reviews on a "price to performance" ratio and I give this 5 stars. This bad buy is a must have for hanging floating shelves. I would recommend buying the amazon basics tripod to make this the complete package. The possibilities for this are endless.
customer_reviews.author: GreenMachine

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for hanging anything that you want to be level. You just clamp it to something about 10 or 15 feet away from the wall you're working on, and it gives you a perfect visual level, horizontally and vertically. And it's self-leveling
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price, the laser line projects at a limited angle, but you'd spend $$ to get more. great for hanging pictures in small rooms, if you have a larger space then pony up the bucks and get the 360 degree devise.
customer_reviews.author: guy campbell

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool for the money. Just make sure to turn off the vertical line if not using it as I have walked into it and caught my eyes in its beam. Don't expect it to be visible outdoors in any kind of daylight....even twighlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laser perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a great price. I used this laser to install my kitchen cabinets and they came out perfect. Very easy to use. Worked great for marking studs vertically as well as cabinets horizontally. Just wish it came with a case. I store mine in its original box.
customer_reviews.author: phil3m

customer_reviews.title: Great Level
customer_reviews.text: We were moving a few months ago and I knew there would lots of hanging and installing that would require a level. The Hammerhead has made several tasks much, much easier. Very simple to use. On a photo tripod (not required) it is very easy to adjust height. This was a purchase I should have made long ago.
customer_reviews.author: David Propst

customer_reviews.title: Has worked grea
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for my uses. Just finished a large bathroom remodel and bought and used this tool for several thing with no problems I use a 12 foot extendable paint roller pole to clamp onto for finishing work but the clamp mount also works well on lumber
customer_reviews.author: Todd D

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I got a new house (bare walls)...and all the curtains, frames etc. were align using this laser. I have a tripod which makes it way easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Amazing quality, super accurate and very reasonable price for a DYIer like myself. Has saved me time and frustration on lots of projects.
customer_reviews.author: inazarinia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. Absolutely in love with this product and price. Almost spent $300 on a Dewalt and Bosch. So glad I bought 2 of these within 72 inch Tripod. Get the tripod too!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry B.

customer_reviews.title: Once you buy it, you'll regret not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this a long time ago. It would have saved me a lot of crooked pictures and extra work. This is AWESOME. I do struggle with putting it in places to match the height but I grab my tripod and it works.
customer_reviews.author: FatherOf4

customer_reviews.title: Good, but need to place in same elevation.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really find something else in the room that is level all the time. Not really sure what to do in those situations.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: easy to understand with green/red light if it's level
customer_reviews.text: My first non water level. It did exactly what I wanted. Auto levels, easy to understand with green/red light if it's level. Used this with command strips to hang some large paintings. Very pleased by it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Should be in every handymans tool box
customer_reviews.text: brilliant and simple. I wish the minimum angle for getting the plumb bob to work was bigger but that's a minor issue. I've got three now since friends saw it and wanted one too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat for the price. It takes longer to settle into a stable beam pattern than more expensive versions but it is certainly useable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Clamps anywhere. Levels up easy. Accurate. Would definitely recommend and would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Craig F. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Way better then eyeballing it
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what i needed to hang things accurately on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy to use. And the price was very reasonable. I haven't used it for any projects yet, but I did test it out and it is accurate. Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J

customer_reviews.title: Good enough leveler for the price. Not for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to layout a wall for board and batten molding. Wall turned out great and this saved me a ton of time and measuring. I do wish it were brighter for outdoor use (perhaps a second mode or brightness setting) but overall a winner for why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F.

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It gives you a straight line but it doesnt give you the straight line you want... doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: it's a good product, but has limited uses
customer_reviews.text: it's a good product, but has limited uses. think hard whether you need it, because a simple laser light for $5 may be all you really need.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: So easy to
customer_reviews.text: The laser is really bright and does everything it says. So easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and best price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality laser level. Packaging can be used as storage. I preferred to use a 6ft wooden ladder with the supplied mounting clamp. Worked great. Hung several individual letters on a wall and this laser made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Weak laser in rooms with windows and daylight
customer_reviews.text: When used indoors during the day with ambient light from windows, the laser does not reach that far, and is not that bright. Solid little unit, but not powerful enough for rooms with windows. As you can see from my attached photo, the laser only went about 7' in each direction. There was a window about 15' away, and the laser was washed out. Not impressed at all, and I probably won't use this often, so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: djhansensr

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, especially for the price! High quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I wasn't aware of what grid t shot but it's a + mark, and you can chose between that the - and the | positions! You drop it anywhere flat and the light turns green once leveled!
customer_reviews.author: Edo Brisku

customer_reviews.title: Great fir trim work!
customer_reviews.text: The level functions great, i put up shadow boxes quickly with it. My only complaint is that the laser fades a little over a foot past the center.
customer_reviews.author: Byron N.

customer_reviews.title: I can't ask for anything more for this value price point.  Great laser and balance so far.
customer_reviews.text: I can't ask for anything more for this value price point. Great laser and balance so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Wolf

customer_reviews.title: excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: great bit of kit. especially love the lock that stops the suspended laser getting damaged
customer_reviews.author: gary milner

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.text: Yes, its limited range 6-10 feet and no you can't really use it outdoors but for the price it works like a charm and I bet you would use it a lot! Clamp setup is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and feels pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure you can beat it for the price. Used this when doing tile and it was a huge benefit. Very easy to use and feels pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Finder

customer_reviews.title: We just bought a new house, and my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new house, and my husband wanted to put knobs on the cabinets. This worked perfectly and now all our knobs are leveled and even!
customer_reviews.author: Candace (Literary Dust)

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a laser level this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, don't let the less expensive price scare you away. My wife is VERY particular about hanging everything in our home level... this is my new go to!
customer_reviews.author: RyanK

customer_reviews.title: Battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is aweful. The low battery blinking light will activate after just 5 minutes. Get rechargeable batteries or battery cost will out pace the level. Other than that, it works well.

customer_reviews.text: First time I used it I was in awe. It's way easier to use than expected.

customer_reviews.title: The best laser level.
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at 20+ different models and finally purchased this one. It's fun to use and the laser blinks so that you can see your work space as well as the level line. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price

customer_reviews.title: Great laser value
customer_reviews.text: Easy operation, very sturdy and adaptable bracket, affordable price point. I think the advertised range of 30' is optimistic; you might get that in a darkened warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Costero

product_meta.title: Compact Self-Leveling Cross Line Laser with Clamp
product_meta.description: The HAMMERHEAD Compact Self-Leveling Cross Line Laser with Adjustable Mounting Clamp projects bright horizontal, vertical or cross lines onto flat surfaces with the accuracy of ±1/4 inch at 30 feet. The unit will self-level when positioned within 4 degrees of level; an LED indicator turns red when the unit is positioned outside of the self-leveling range. In the lock (manual) mode, the cross line laser can be positioned to project lines that are not level or plumb for projects that require them. The included adjustable mounting clamp easily attaches to a variety of surfaces to extend the utility of the tool. The cross line laser may also be mounted on any 1/4" threaded tripod screw. Kit includes: (1) Compact Self-Leveling Cross Line Laser, (1) Adjustable Mounting Clamp and (2) AA Batteries
feature_bullets: Projects bright lines; ideal for tile alignment, wall studding, windows, doors, etc.
Accuracy: 1/4 in. at a range of 30 ft.
Three laser-line modes: Level, Plumb and Cross-Line
Self-leveling capability when within 4Degree of level
Includes easy to adjust clamp for multiple applications
